title: Marvel's Avengers: Spider-Man Gameplay Finally Revealed! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 11.22.21
description:
Blessing and Tim kick off the week with a banger news day. Let's talk about Spider-Man gameplay in Marvel's Avengers, Horizon Forbidden West details and more!

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:30 - Housekeeping
This week is Thanksgiving week in the United States and so no KFGD or livestreams after Tuesday this week.
But speaking of livestreams, about an hour after this KFGD ends, we’re recording PS I Love You XOXO live on Patreon. It’s our “Best PlayStation Character” bracket. That’s one that you don’t wanna miss live if you’re a Patron because you’ll have the opportunity to vote in straw polls to break ties and help determine the characters that move on. That episode will be up for everyone to watch and listen to on Tuesday.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Pranksy & Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:06:04 -  IGN has published an exclusive preview for Spider-Man in Marvel’s Avengers - Simon Cardy @ IGN
00:20:20 - Horizon Forbidden West Has a Whole Team of Developers Just to Make the Open World Feel Alive - Jared Moore @ IGN
00:30:50 -  Ad
00:33:58 - Riot’s fighting game Project L looks raw as hell - Vikki Blake @ GamesRadar
00:42:25 - Kojima Productions launches new film, TV and music division - Chris Dring @ GiBiz
00:45:25 - Hitman 3 Adding New Maps, Storylines, And Modes In 2022 - Darren Bonthuys @ Gamespot
00:48:03 - Good news for Tim Gettys
00:49:20 - Out today
00:51:28 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Tim and Whitta

Epic Creator Code: KindaFunny

story number two her rise for ben west has a whole team of developers uh just to make the open world feel alive this is jared moore at ign horizon forbidden west has a whole team of developers solely dedicated to making his open world experience feel alive for players in the game called the living world team in a new insight into horizon horizon forbidden west on the playstation blog lead living world designer at gorilla espenson explains how his team is working on it on different aspects of the world design to bring the playstation exclusive to life quote when you walk through the forbidden west everything should feel like it belongs there says son they continue the living world team at gorilla works on aspects of the game that makes the world feel authentic and alive the tribes the settlements and the people within them there's an intention behind everything we place within the world end quote it's similarly that intention that will help players to understand uh and fully experience

and the people within them there's an intention behind everything we place within the world end quote it's similarly that intention that will help players to understand uh and fully experience forbidden west storyline and characters when it launches next year as part of the post the studio explains that the living world team has been working closely alongside the game's narrative designers to ensure players are greeted with a visual experience that makes sense from a storytelling perspective throughout the game quote our main challenge is translating this narrative framework into visuals that are integral to the world itself says son it continues for example the tanakh one of the human tribes within the game are known to be competitive and combat focused but so are other tribes so how do we distinguish distinguish them and how do we communicate that visually it then becomes all about the details the animations and behaviors within their settlements you'll see the tanakh working
